-- | Please see the README on GitHub at

@package plutus-pab-executables
@version 1.1.0.0

module Plutus.PAB.Run.PSGenerator

-- | List of types linked to contract type <tt>a</tt> that need to be
--   available in Purescript.
class HasPSTypes a
psTypes :: HasPSTypes a => [SumType 'Haskell]

-- | PAB's main bridge that includes common bridges
pabBridge :: BridgePart
data PabBridge
pabBridgeProxy :: Proxy PabBridge

-- | PAB's list of types that includes common types.
pabTypes :: [SumType 'Haskell]
pabSettings :: Settings

-- | Use the Proxy for specifying <tt>a</tt> when generating PS functions
--   for the webserver using a specific Builtin (ex. generate 'Builtin
--   Marlowe' instead of 'Builtin a').
generateAPIModule :: forall a. (Typeable a, HasPSTypes a) => Proxy a -> FilePath -> IO ()
instance Servant.PureScript.Internal.HasBridge Plutus.PAB.Run.PSGenerator.PabBridge
